des: "An easy and inexpensive twist on sangria that is sure to please!  My friends ask me to bring this to parties and it's easy to double the recipe or add more fruit as needed."
ins: Combine white wine, brandy, and sugar in a large pitcher, then stir in ice. Continue stirring until the sugar is dissolved, then add the lime, lemon, apples, and grapes. Stir in the club soda.
